page.title: 07SCHOOL ACTIVITIES 1985
page.content: 1.Welsh language course at Glynllifon. 2.A visit to the summit of Moelwyn Bach. 3.By B.R.to Tywyn + a trip on the Talyllyn Railway. 4.Lower juniors to Colwyn Bay Zoo. 5.Weekly visit to Harlech Swimming Baths. 6.Area sports at Harlech. 7.Highway-code compertition at Harlech. 8.Football games against Harlech,Barmouth,Dyffryn Ardudwy,& Llanbedr schools. 9.A visit to Clwb Dwyryd to sing to the senior citizens. 10.The reception class visited a farm at Bala. 11. Cycling proficency lessons for the upper juniors. 12. The computer club is held once a week after school
